SELECT d.id, d.name, d.image, d.price, SUM(od.number) AS sales FROM order_detail od JOIN orders o ON od.order_id = o.id JOIN dish d ON od.dish_id = d.id WHERE o.status = 5 AND d.status = 1 GROUP BY d.id, d.name, d.image, d.price ORDER BY sales DESC LIMIT 10
